nodes.text: Derg Prantis was a male Twi'lek biologist who was killed during the time of the Galactic Civil War.
Derg Prantis had a job of biologist for Mos Eisley Biolab, based in Mos Eisley, on the planet Tatooine.

Circa 1 ABY, the laboratory in Mos Eisley was attacked and Prantis  was assassinated. In the meanwhile, Derg Prantis's fellow Bera Jeza was murdered in a street of Mos Eisley. As Jeza had ties with the Hutt Crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure, Bib Fortuna hired a spacer to investigate the crime. The spacer discovered Prantis's corpse in the laboratory along with a data disk. The disk contained Derg Prantis's last words, with instructions to contact Slicer Cale Herron in Mos Taike. The investigation eventually led to the discovery of the Blackwing outbreak on Dathomir.

Derg Prantis was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts. The game was shut down on December 15, 2011.
